item.title: Simulate

item.title: Snake Game in Minutes with Flutter
item.description: Source: Snake Game DartPad: Play Snake Game Introduction Snake game is probably one of the most known video games in the world and I have built it multiple times, why? Because it’s a good intro project to any new language or framework. I have built it with Python, C++, Javascript, and Dart (Flutter). I frequently use it as an example when I’m teaching someone the basics of a language/framework.
